title: SLGM Announces New Partnership with Prominent Joint Venture
text:
SLGM Announces New Partnership with Prominent Joint Venture 
SLGM and Elite Traders Insurance announce a joint venture for a new innovative insurance policy devised especially for the non sales related occupations within the motor trade. 
United Kingdom , 13 October 2015 -- 
SLGM Announces New Partnership with Prominent Joint Venture 
Motor trade insurance lead provider, SLGM and Joint Venture, Elite Traders Insurance have announced a strategic partnership going forward. The partnership will encompass SLGM, who are now marketing a new Elite Motor Trade insurance policy that is revolutionary within the motor trade insurance market place. Through new innovations customers can now for the first time get a live instant quote for a motor trade insurance policy - this has not been done before in the motor trade insurance market place. This opportunity showcases the marketing innovations that SLGM have now brought to the industry and gives the new Elite Traders Insurance scheme an excellent launch platform. In the near future, customers of the Elite Traders Insurance policy can expect exclusive benefits which include; a price guarantee that your policy renewal premium will not go up at all ( subject to no accidents, claims or convictions ), protected no claims bonus for the life of the policy, unlimited sports & high performance cover up to ABI group 40 & the ability to drive any car as standard. These are just some of the exciting standard inclusions in the policy. As part of a long-term strategy, the two companies hope to to drive the new insurance scheme into becoming the “go to” policy for experienced non sales related business within the motor trade industry. When asked about the new joint venture, D James from SLGM said, SLGM are a forward thinking lead provider who pride themselves on the quality of the leads they generate for their partners, offering leads that convert time after time and being given the opportunity to launch this innovative product makes us very proud of how far we have come in such a short space of time. M Roberts of Elite Motor Trade Insurance is also excited about the venture, saying The Elite Motor Trader insurance scheme has been devised for hard working traders that want more than just standard cover from their insurance while maintaining great affordable premiums, this policy is unlike any other on the market place, and now with the ability to get an instant quote online, we can’t wait to launch the campaign. Current and future customers are invited to learn more about the joint venture and how they will benefit by visiting the Traders Insurance website at http://elitemotortrader.co.uk About SLGM and Elite Motor Trade Insurance SLGM was founded in 2014 and is a lead generation provider for the motor trade industry. Elite Motor Trade Insurance was founded in 2015 and serves the non sales related occupations within the motor trade industry. # # #
